title: I have issues pairing Bluetooth as there is no pop-up screen to enter a confirmation code on phon.
content: I have cleared the Bluetooth application cache and storage, rebooted numerous times, manually cleaned out all Bluetooth devices, reset all networking. I am running RQ3A.210605.005 on pixel 4a5g. Other devices with no confirm page connect but anything with a pin fails. Currently failing with with Jabra 65t elite and lg tv Bluetooth. Works with my computer hp laptop.
